version_description:
- Enjoy a better search experience when you book flights.
- Order food on-the-go from terminals in DFW, AUS, LAX, ATL, MIA and LHR. Pull up the terminal map to see what’s cooking and look for more locations soon.
- Manage and update your AAdvantage account on-the-go. We’ll keep you logged in.
- Plus, other small enhancements and bug fixes.

- Manage and update your AAdvantage account on-the-go. We’ll keep you logged in.
- Plus, other small enhancements and bug fixes.

- Enjoy a better search experience when you book flights.
- Order food on-the-go from terminals in DFW, AUS, LAX, ATL, MIA and LHR. Pull up the terminal map to see what’s cooking and look for more locations soon.
- Manage and update your AAdvantage account on-the-go. We’ll keep you logged in.
- Plus, other small enhancements and bug fixes.

- Make a same-day flight change—just tap your trip and slide up the travel tools menu
- Enjoy a new look and feel when you check in for international flights
- Bug fixes and other enhancements

- Make a same-day flight change—just tap your trip and slide up the travel tools menu
- Enjoy a new look and feel when you check in for international flights
- Bug fixes and other enhancements
To make our app better for you, we make ongoing updates to improve your experience. Thanks for choosing American Airlines.

What’s new:
· New look and feel when you request and view upgrades
· Other small enhancements and bug fixes

· Get boarding passes for up to 9 passengers in your trip.
· Scan your passport when you check in for your flight (instead of entering the info manually).
· Enjoy an improved flight status look-up and display.
· Plus, other enhancements and bug fixes.

We’ve made it easier to find and purchase reservations on hold, redesigned the AAdvantage account summary and introduced new account features:
• Promotions – See available promotions, register and track your progress
• Wallet – View award miles and upgrade balances

To make our app better for you, we make ongoing updates to improve your experience. Thanks for choosing American Airlines.

· Discover our darker theme and interface with Dark Mode for iOS 13
· Get the right information at the right time with Siri Event Suggestions. Siri Event Suggestions proactively adds your upcoming flights to Calendar, provides driving directions, and more.
· You can now make same-day confirmed flight changes or standby on select flights for a fee, with some exceptions, directly from our app

• You can now view the upgrade list 8 hours before departure
• Ongoing bug fixes and enhancements
• Ongoing bug fixes and enhancements
• Ongoing bug fixes and enhancements
• Ongoing bug fixes and enhancements

• The new 'Waitlist' includes both the upgrade and standby lists. We'll show the upgrade list by the cabin you requested. And once your request clears, you'll see your name highlighted along with your new seat.
• Ongoing bug fixes and enhancements

• The new 'Waitlist' includes both the upgrade and standby lists. We'll show the upgrade list by the cabin you requested. And once your request clears, you'll see your name highlighted along with your new seat.

• Access chat more easily with a single tap of our new chat icon on the home screen

• If you’ve updated to iOS 14, you can add the American Airlines widget to your home screen and view your travel information at-a-glance.
• Not an AAdvantage member?
Don’t worry, you can still search for your Flight Credit under ‘Find trip.’

* Have Flight Credit? You can check flights and rebook using your available credit under ‘Find trip.’

• You can pay for checked bags for your upcoming trip with Apple Pay.
• We made it easier to manage your trip in the app.
• And, we made ongoing bug fixes and enhancements.
